TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: 创建调用方与实现 IDataObject 接口的数据对象之间的连接。

span.span: Creates a connection between a caller and a data object implementing the IDataObject interface.

summary.span: 通过此连接，可以向调用方通知数据对象中数据的更改。

span.span: This connection enables notifications of changes in the data for the data object to the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用 IDataObject 接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 的编程的详细信息，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IDataObject interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int DAdvise (IntPtr a, int b, IntPtr c, ref int d);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 DAdvise(native int a, int32 b, native int c, int32& d) cil managed
Public Function DAdvise (a As IntPtr, b As Integer, c As IntPtr, ByRef d As Integer) As Integer
public: int DAdvise(IntPtr a, int b, IntPtr c, int % d);
abstract member DAdvise : nativeint * int * nativeint * -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 指向 的指针，它定义通知的格式、介质和目标设备。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for notifications.

param.name: b
param.span: 值，它指定所请求的连接行为。

span.span: An value specifying the requested behavior for the connection.

param.name: c
param.span: 指向调用方对象上的 的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the on the caller object.

param.name: d
param.span: 指向连接的指针，该连接由对 DAdvise 方法的此调用设置。

span.span: A pointer to the connection set up by this call to the DAdvise method.

summary.span: 创建实现 接口的数据对象与调用方对象之间的通知连接，使调用方接收到有关数据对象中数据更改的通知。

span.span: Creates a notification connection between a data object implementing the interface and a caller object, letting the caller receive notification of changes in the data for the data object.

Docs.returns:
DAdvise 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The DAdvise method supports the standard returns values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | DAdvise 方法成功创建了连接。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The DAdvise method successfully created the connection. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 数据对象不实现 DAdvise 方法。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The data object does not implement the DAdvise method. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 数据指针值无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | The data pointer value is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 对象不支持更改通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Public Function DUnadvise (a As Integer) As Integer
public: int DUnadvise(int a);
abstract member DUnadvise : int -> int

span.span: The connection to destroy.

summary.span: 损坏由于先前调用 方法而创建的通知连接。

span.span: Destroys a notification connection that was created by an earlier call to the method.

Docs.returns: | 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | DUnadvise 方法成功删除了指定连接。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The DUnadvise method successfully deleted the specified connection. | | OLE\_E\_NOCONNECTION | 指定连接不是有效连接。| | OLE\_E\_NOCONNECTION | The specified connection is not a valid connection. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 对象不支持更改通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

span.span: There are no connections if this call to the EnumDAdvise method sets to .

summary.span: 检索指向一个对象的指针，该对象可以枚举此 接口当前维护的通知连接。

span.span: Retrieves a pointer to an object that can enumerate the notification connections that are currently maintained by this interface.

Docs.returns:
EnumDAdvise 方法支持标准返回值 E_OUTOFMEMORY 和以下返回值：The EnumDAdvise method supports the standard return value E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 EnumDAdvise 方法的此次调用成功创建了枚举器对象的实例。或者没有连接。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the EnumDAdvise method successfully created the instance of the enumerator object.-or-There are no connections. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 对象不支持更改通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

span.span: An output variable address receiving the .

Docs.returns:
EnumFormatEtc 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The EnumFormatEtc method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 EnumFormatEtc 方法的此次调用成功创建了枚举器对象。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the EnumFormatEtc method successfully created the enumerator object. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 不支持指定的方向。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The specified direction is not supported. | | OLE\_S\_USEREG | 向 OLE 发出的枚举注册表中的格式的请求。| | OLE\_S\_USEREG | A request to OLE to enumerate the formats from the registry. |

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetCanonicalFormatEtc (IntPtr a, IntPtr b);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetCanonicalFormatEtc(native int a, native int b) cil managed
Public Function GetCanonicalFormatEtc (a As IntPtr, b As IntPtr) As Integer
public: int GetCanonicalFormatEtc(IntPtr a, IntPtr b);
abstract member GetCanonicalFormatEtc : nativeint * nativeint -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为检索数据的调用定义格式、介质和目标设备。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

param.name: b
param.span: 如果 GetCanonicalFormatEtc 方法返回 DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC，为指向 FORMATETC 的输出指针，该指针包含特定呈现可能使用的最常见信息或 。

span.span: An output pointer to a FORMATETC containing the most general information possible for a specific rendering or , if the GetCanonicalFormatEtc method returns DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC.

summary.span: 检索指向标准 结构的指针，该结构在逻辑上等效于（但不一定等于） 参数引用的 结构。

span.span: Retrieves a pointer to a standard structure that is logically equivalent to, but not necessarily equal to, the structure that is referenced by the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetCanonicalFormatEtc 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The GetCanonicalFormatEtc method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | |S\_OK |返回的 FORMATETC 与参数中传递的结构不同。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The returned FORMATETC is different from the structure passed in the parameters. | | DATA\_S\_SAMEFORMATETC | 返回的 FORMATETC 与参数中传递的结构相同，并且 在 中返回。| | DATA\_S\_SAMEFORMATETC | The returned FORMATETC is the same as the structure passed in the parameters and is returned in . | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetCanonicalFormatEtc 方法允许的实施者接口以返回一个规范无需复制的呈现逻辑的结构结构。The GetCanonicalFormatEtc method allows the implementer of the interface to return a canonical structure without duplicating the rendering logic for the structure. 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

abstract member GetData : * -> int

param.name: pFormatEtc
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为检索数据的调用定义格式、介质和目标设备。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

param.name: b
param.span: 指向 的指针，它指示包含返回数据的存储介质。

span.span: A pointer to the indicating the storage medium containing the returned data.

summary.span: 呈现指定的 pFormatEtc 结构中描述的数据，并将它传输给 参数。

span.span: Renders the data that is described in the specified pFormatEtc structure and transfers it to the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetData 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The GetData method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 GetData 方法的此调用成功地检索到了数据，并将数据放入了所提供的存储介质中。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the GetData method successfully retrieved and placed data in the provided storage medium. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 无效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 无效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. | | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | 分配介质时出错。| | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | An error occurred when allocating the medium. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

span.span: Renders the data that is described in the specified pFormatEtc structure and transfers it to the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetDataHere 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The GetDataHere method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 GetDataHere 方法的此调用成功地检索到了数据，并将数据放入了所提供的存储介质中。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the GetDataHere method successfully retrieved and placed data in the provided storage medium. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 无效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 无效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. | | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | 分配介质时出错。| | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | An error occurred when allocating the medium. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetDataHere 方法不同于方法，调用方必须分配并释放指定的存储介质。The GetDataHere method differs from the method in that the caller must allocate and release the specified storage medium. 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int QueryGetData (Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.FORMATETC a);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 QueryGetData(valuetype Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.FORMATETC a) cil managed
Public Function QueryGetData (a As FORMATETC) As Integer
public: int QueryGetData(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::FORMATETC a);
abstract member QueryGetData : Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.FORMATETC -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为检索数据的调用定义格式、介质和目标设备。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

summary.span: 检索一个值，该值指示实施者能否呈现包含在 参数中的数据。

span.span: Retrieves a value indicating whether the implementer can render the data that is contained in the parameter.

Docs.returns:
QueryGetData 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The QueryGetData method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 方法的后续调用可能会成功。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | A subsequent call to the method probably will be successful. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 无效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 值。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect value. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现一个数据对象的客户端接口调用 QueryGetData 方法来确定的后续调用成功的可能性方法。A client of a data object that implements the interface calls the QueryGetData method to determine the likelihood of success of a subsequent call to the method. 结果，该值指示此实例的接口可以呈现中包含的数据`a`参数不能保证在的后续调用中成功方法。A result indicating that this instance of the interface can render the data that is contained in the `a` parameter does not guarantee success in a subsequent call to the method. 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public int SetData (IntPtr a, IntPtr b, int c);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 SetData(native int a, native int b, int32 c) cil managed
Public Function SetData (a As IntPtr, b As IntPtr, c As Integer) As Integer
public: int SetData(IntPtr a, IntPtr b, int c);
abstract member SetData : nativeint * nativeint * int -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为实现 的数据对象定义当解释包含在存储介质中的数据时应采用的格式。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format for the data object implementing the to use when interpreting the data contained in the storage medium.

param.name: b
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为 SetData 方法定义用来传递数据的存储介质。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the storage medium for the SetData method to use to pass the data.

param.name: c
param.span: 如果要指定实现 的被调用数据对象在调用后拥有存储介质，并且必须在使用完介质后释放介质，则为 true；如果要指定调用方保留对存储介质的所属权，数据对象只在调用期间使用介质，则为 false。

span.span: true to specify that the called data object implementing the owns the storage medium after the call and must free the medium after it has been used; otherwise, false to specify the caller retains ownership of the storage medium and the data object uses the medium for the duration of the call only.

summary.span: 将包含在 结构中、被 引用的数据传输到 接口的此实例。

span.span: Transfers the data that is contained in the structure, referenced by , to this instance of the interface.

Docs.returns:
SetData 方法支持 E_FAIL、E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The SetData method supports the standard return values E_FAIL, E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 SetData 方法的调用成功传输了数据。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the SetData method successfully transferred the data. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 没有为实现 的数据对象实现 SetData 方法。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The SetData method is not implemented for the data object implementing the . | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 无效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 无效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关编程的详细信息接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
